00015

00017         private SqlCeDataAdapter mySqlDataAdapter = new SqlCeDataAdapter();

00020

00026         public DataBase()
00027         {
00028             try
00029             {
00030                 myConnection.ConnectionString = connString;
00031                 myConnection.Open();
00032                 connected = true;
00033             }
00034             catch (SqlCeException ex)
00035             {
00036                 connected = false;
00037                 error = ex.Message;
00038             }
00039             finally
00040             {
00041 
00042             }
00043         }

00046         {
00047             myConnection.Close();
00048             connected = false;
00049         }
00050

00054         }

00059         private DataTable select()
00060         {
00061             try
00062             {
00063                 myDataTable = new DataTable();
00064                 mySqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand.ExecuteReader();
00065                 myConnection.Close();
00066                 myConnection.Open();
00067                 mySqlDataAdapter.Fill(myDataTable);
00068                 connected = true;
00069             }
00070             catch (SqlCeException ex0)
00071             {
00072                 connected = false;
00073                 error = ex0.ToString();
00074             }
00075             finally
00076             {
00077 
00078             }
00079             return myDataTable;
00080         }
